Posts.Content: My local co-op chemist has bio oil half price this week, hopefully all co-op's will have this offer
Posts.Title: Helping to heal scars

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, was wondering where's best place to go to get measured for a bra, a nice comfy one, so I can wear it after my op. Tks. Jan.
Posts.Title: Getting measured for a bra before MX & reconstruction

Posts.Content: Thanks for your help, I'm not very good on computer, so please excuse any mistakes I'm make, but soft bras that pull over head sounds good, I'm not very big so bras you mentioned sound good & I'd be more than happy to make a donation to forum members giving page. I had sentinel node biopsy on Tuesday, & I'm awaiting results.
